To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MidPoint _midpoint;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_midpoint = MIDPOINT(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_midpoint.IsReady)
{
    var current = _midpoint.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.midpoint = self.MIDPOINT(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.midpoint.IsReady:
    current = self.midpoint.Current.Value
